design-basics.title: Design Basics
design-basics.subtitle: Let's personalize your report
design-basics.upload-logo-info: Please provide your logo in editable format (.png, .jpg, .svg). Logos provided in other formats may appear distorted.
design-basics.upload-logo-text-2: Max Size 300px - JPG, PNG and SVG
design-basics.company-color-info-0: Please provide your color in screen format (eg. #10b7ac) or choose from the palette.
design-basics.color-code: Or input your company color code
design-basics.available-styles: There are three styles available for your CORE report. Please select the style you prefer.

new.title: Create a New Report
new.name: Report Name
new.name-required: Please provide a name for the Report
new.type-required: Please provide a type for the Report
new.model-required: Please provide a model for the Report
new.year-required: Please provide the year of the Report
new.dataset-required: Please select the dataset(s) of the Report

editor.title: Report Editor - {{report}}
editor.info: Please select the KPIs that you want to include in the report. All KPIs are included by default.
